[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”rgba(135,135,135,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/dcyl0iocy0a-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”41px||63px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto|on||on|” text_font_size=”24px” text_letter_spacing=”4px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”zoom” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%”]Exclusive Offer[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

DUBAI

6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”2px|0px|12px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”46px” custom_margin=”0px||-1px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT DUBAI

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”60px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Upon arrival, transfer to your hotel and check-in. Day at leisure.

Overnight in Dubai.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: ABU DHABI CITY TOUR + GLOBAL VILLAGE

Breakfast in the hotel. Pick up from Hotel for Abu Dhabi City Tour. A must-see historical monument en-route Abu Dhabi city centre is the astounding grand white structure–the Sheik Zayed Grand Mosque, named to honor the late president, His Highness Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan. The tour will  take you to attractions such as the stunning Emirates Palace, the bustling Abu Dhabi city center and then down the exquisite Corniche, showcasing an impeccably manicured setting, with cafes, restaurants, and children’s play areas. Head towards Ferrari World and Yas Island. Ferrari World Abu Dhabi is and amusement park located on Yas Island. It is the first Ferrari branded theme park and had the record for the largest space frame structure ever built. Formula Rossa, the world’s fastest roller coaster, is also located here. Drop-off to Dubai hotel for short relaxation and later visit the amazing Global Village. Visited by over five million people every year, The Global Village brings together the best of cultural offerings through 32 giant stalls and pavilions representing more than 75 countries with different cultures.

Overnight in Dubai

    

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: DUBAI FRAME + DHOW CRUISE DINNER

Breakfast in the hotel. Pick up from Hotel  for visit to Dubai Frame. The Dubai Frame is the new addition to the marvellous architecture of the city. Consisting of two vertical towers of 150 meters height connected by a 100-square-meter bridge, the Dubai Frame is a highlight of the Dubai skyline. A tour of the Dubai Frame is a must! The Dubai Frame has a museum and gallery where you can see the growth of Dubai from a simple fishing village to the ultra-modern city it is today with the use of photos and advanced technology. After visiting the museum, you take the elevator to the bridge to get a fascinating glimpse of the city. On one side is the charming old Dubai and on the other side is the modern new Dubai. You can also view the beautiful city while sipping delicious cup of coffee at the cafe on the bridge. In the evening experience something that is inexplicable and beyond your imagination with our 2-hour classy cruise. The Venetian styled canal will leave you and your loved ones impressed. This traditional dhow will offer you the best views of modern Dubai from the most unexpected angles. Witness the glorious architectures of Dubai that the world acknowledges while you feast on the international cuisines. An elegant and sophisticated setting will elevate your cruising experience and leave you with lovely memories to cherish for a lifetime. Entertainment will be arranged onboard and you will be cruising over the Dubai’s Marina while enjoying the savory dishes .The stunning view, sumptuous meals and the live entertainment will give you a dazzling experience. Head back to the hotel.

Overnight in Dubai.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

spDAY 04: DUBAI CITY TOUR + DESERT SAFARI

Depart from the hotel after breakfast for the Dubai City Tour. This tour introduces both the new and old parts of Dubai, commencing with the world renowned Atlantis Hotel in the Palm Jumeirah – a man-made island that can be spotted from space! Enjoy a view of one of the only 7-star hotels in the world, the Burj Al Arab. Next, enjoy a visit to an exquisite cultural landmark of Dubai – the Jumeirah Mosque, followed by the Union House. The latter is where the treaty that formed the United Arab Emirates was signed in 1971. Located at the 18th century Al Fahidi Fort, the Dubai Museum displays arts and artifacts reflecting the ancient history and lifestyle of traditional Arabs – an ideal blend of the outstanding Islamic and contemporary architecture. Drop-off to Dubai hotel for a short relaxation. Between 2:30pm to 3:00pm, meet your driver in the hotel lobby for your Desert Safari Adventure with BBQ Dinner. Inclusions:  Dune drive, camel ride, sand boarding, henna painting, Arabic costumes photography, belly dancing, Tanoura dance, BBQ dinner buffet, water, drinks, coffee, tea. Drive back to the hotel.

Overnigth in Dubai.

  

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: MIRACLE GARDEN + EVENING BURJ KHALIFA

Breakfast at the hotel.

Leisure time in the morning. In the afternoon, visit the Dubai Miracle Garden, which houses a myriad blooming flowers in stunning designs, many growing on spectacular shapes and structures. The Miracle Garden’s 3,600-foot flower wall holds the Guinness World Record for the world’s longest wall of flowers. Later, head towards The Dubai Mall, the world largest mall, encompassing over one thousand shops and entertainment activities – from retail stores and restaurants to the famous SEGA Republic, Dubai’s indoor theme park, and Kidzania, a children’s entertainment centre. Numerous world records are located in this mall: the tallest dancing fountains; the largest aquarium; the largest ice rink in the Middle East; and finally, the largest Gold Souk in the world. Go up the tallest tower in the world, The Burj Khalifa, and experience the exquisite scenic views of Dubai from the 124th floor.

Overnight in Dubai.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE

Breakfast at the hotel. 

Transfer to Dubai Airport (Terminal 1) to board the scheduled flight to city of origin or next destination.

Have a safe trip!
